description:
In this course titled ' NLP- Let Go Of The Fear Of Rejection Using NLP ' By Pradeep Aggarwal , you will learn many NLP and Self Hypnosis techniques to let go of the fear in your mind of getting rejected by the opposite sex , at an audition, social circle , team selection etc .

We may face many rejections in life but having fear in your mind before the situation arrives can cause hurdles in your path of success.

By taking this course you will be able to completely eradicate the feeling of fear in your mind by using anchoring, circle of excellence , mind triggers , relaxation techniques etc

This course is in English and contains more than 30 minutes of live video content designed in 9 lectures

This course contains

  • Lecture1:Introduction
  • Lecture2: How Badly Can Fear Of Rejection Affect You?
  • Lecture3:Self Assessment Exercise
  • Lecture4:Self Hypnosis Relaxation – Simple Relaxation Technique
  • Lecture5:Anchoring Relaxation – Learn How To Use NLP Anchoring Technique
  • Lecture6:Anchoring Confidence – Create An Anchor For Confidence
  • Lecture7:Reverse Spin Technique – Learn How To Reverse The Feeling Of Failure
  • Lecture8:Circle Of Excellence - To Increase Confidence
  • Lecture9:Summary
title: NLP- Let Go Of The Fear Of Rejection Using NLP
